post.title: new official nvidia 177.92 beta drivers released
post.content: some new beta drivers have been released by nvidia, fully supports geforce 6-9 and 200 series cards. http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp_177.92_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp64_177.92_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...7.92_beta.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...7.92_beta.html
